name: Deploy Script Execution
description: Verify deploy script runs on channel start and sets $gc values

name: Undeploy Script Execution
description: Verify undeploy script runs on channel stop and sets $g values

name: Preprocessor Message Modification
description: Verify preprocessor can modify raw message before processing

name: Postprocessor Execution
description: Verify postprocessor runs after all destinations complete

name: Full Lifecycle Script Order
description: Verify all scripts run in correct order: deploy -> pre -> post -> undeploy

name: Script Scope Variable Availability
description: Verify each script type has access to correct scope variables
